entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
